channel.title: Cycling on Dane's Blog on Travel and Data

item.title: Cycling from Carpinteria to Ventura
item.description: There is a path that goes from Rincon Point (with a little effort you can actually start from Carpinteria State Park) all the way to Marina Park in Ventura. Much of the trail is right along the ocean and the view is wonderful. It’s an easy ride that is well worth it.
